name: Mojito
description: A light, minty refresher with zesty lime and subtle agave sweetness, topped with bubbly soda.

name: Banana Colada
description: Creamy banana meets tropical coconut and juicy pineapple for that island-vacation vibe.

name: Mango Colada
description: Mango-rich twist on the classic Piña Colada—fruity, creamy, and indulgent.

name: Dark & Pineapple
description: Bold rum balanced by sweet pineapple and a citrus twist—simple and sun-soaked.

name: Rum Sunset
description: Layered hues of sunset in a glass—citrus sweetness with a cherry-red finish.

name: Minted Mango Daiquiri
description: Lush mango meets cool mint and tangy lime for a breezy, tropical sip.

name: Crown Cherry Blossom
description: A smooth blend of whiskey and amaretto with a cherry-kissed cranberry base.

name: Frozen Mango Margarita
description: A frozen twist on the classic margarita, featuring tangy lime and sweet mango.

name: Frozen Peach Margarita
description: Frozen peaches and tequila unite in this juicy, chilled delight.

name: Crown Island Breeze
description: Whiskey takes a tropical turn with pineapple and lime in this smooth and breezy sipper.

name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical classic with layers of rum, citrus, and almond for a complex and refreshing taste.

name: Banana Hammock
description: Playful and decadent, this creamy banana drink brings dessert vibes with every sip.

name: Frozen Piña Colada
description: A frozen island escape of creamy coconut and bright pineapple.

name: Frozen Peach Daiquiri
description: Peach and lime come together in a frosty daiquiri full of sunshine.

name: Blue Hawaiian
description: A vibrant, tropical dream of pineapple and coconut with ocean-blue flair.

name: Tom Collins
description: A sparkling citrus classic with a gin backbone and bubbly finish.

name: Bee’s Knees
description: Bright, floral, and smooth—gin meets lemon and honey in this Prohibition-era gem.

name: Butterscotch Banana Cream Pie
description: Decadent, creamy, and dessert in a glass.

name: Bananas Foster Martini
description: A bold and buttery banana cocktail with a boozy dessert twist.

name: Rum Cake Martini
description: Rum-soaked chocolate and berry cake flavor in a creamy martini.
